content: Selling azure accounts with pay as you go subscriptionthey last 30 days sometimes more if youdo not break azure acceptable policy or don't do any illegalactivities.Mining BTC/ETH/Altcoins will suspend your account very fastI'll give 2 days warranty for these accounts, if they aresuspended before 2 days i will give you a new account for free or a refundAdd me if you're interested (i make the accounts on request so it might take a while before delivering you the account)telegram: @kazurengandiscord: bruno10#5434skype: live:brunommartins3https://i.imgur.com/r1UYB1L.png
